titles.title: Stephen Hacala Poppy Seed Safety Act
Stephen Hacala Poppy Seed Safety Act
A bill to prohibit the sale of food that is, or contains, unsafe poppy seeds.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Stephen Hacala Poppy Seed Safety Act
This bill prohibits the sale of food that contains poppy seeds with potentially harmful levels of morphine, codeine, or other alkaloid compounds.
